```{r}
a = c(1,3,2,2,3,1,2,3)
a = sort(a)
sum = 0
current_word = ""
for(i in 1:length(a)){
  if (a[i] != current_word){   
    print("current_word");
    print(current_word);
    print("sum");
    print(sum);
    current_word = a[i];
    sum = 1;
  }else{
    sum = sum + 1;
  }
}
print("current_word");
print(current_word);
print("sum");
print(sum);


a = c(1,3,2,2,3,1,2,3)
output = list()
for(i in 1:length(a)){
  v = a[i];
  if (is.null(output[v][[1]]) ==TRUE){   
    output[a[i]] = 1;
  }
  else{
    output[a[i]] = output[a[i]][[1]] + 1;
  }
}
print(output);
```

Match Exercise
```{r}
match_func= function(filename="match.txt") {

  match = read.table(filename, sep='|')
  mat = matrix(-1, nrow=5, ncol=5)
  rownames(mat) = c("A","B","C","D","E")
  colnames(mat) = c("A","B","C","D","E")
  
  for (i in 1:nrow(match)){
  mat[match[i,]$V1,match[i,]$V2] = match[i,]$V3
  }
  mat
}
match_func()
```
